column1: The creation of the BioScope corpus CITATION assisted in the development and evaluation of several negation/hedge scope detection systems.
The CoNLL2010 Shared Task CITATION focused on detecting hedges and their scopes in Wikipedia articles and biomedical texts.
The top three best performers on the CoNLL2010 shared task on hedge scope detection CITATION report an F1-score for correctly identified hedge cues and their scopes ranging from 55.3 to 57.3.

column1: The creation of the BioScope corpus CITATION assisted in the development and evaluation of several negation/hedge scope detection systems.
The CoNLL2010 Shared Task CITATION focused on detecting hedges and their scopes in Wikipedia articles and biomedical texts.
3 Dataset We used the BioScope corpus CITATION to develop our system and evaluate its performance.
All systems described below were developed and evaluated against the BioScope corpus CITATION.
CITATION have developed a supervised classifier for identifying speculation cues and a manually compiled list of lexico-syntactic rules for identifying their scopes.
